com.herokuapp.polimiboardgamemanager.resources

Class UserResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.herokuapp.polimiboardgamemanager.resources.UserResource

  • @Path(value="/users")
 @Produces(value={"application/json","application/xml","text/xml"})
public class UserResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Resource representing the users. It responds to http requests sent to path "/users", to manage users and plays associated to the user.
    Author:
    Luca Luciano Costanzo

    • Method Detail

      • authenticateUser

        @POST
 @Path(value="/login")
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response authenticateUser(@FormParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                     @FormParam(value="password")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String password)
        It receives POST requests sent to "/users/login" path and authenticates a user with his username and password.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user to authenticate
        password - the password of the user to authenticate
        Returns:
        200 OK containing the authorization bearer in the header if the login is successful,
        401 Unauthorized if the username and/or password are wrong.

      • create

        @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response create(@FormParam(value="fullName")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String fullName,
                                                                                                    @FormParam(value="username")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                    @FormParam(value="password")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String password)
        It receives POST requests sent to "/users" path and creates a user with the desired attributes.
        Parameters:
        fullName - the full name of the user to create
        username - the username of the user to create
        password - the password of the user to create
        Returns:
        201 Created containing the URI of the created user, if everything it's correct,
        409 Conflict if an user with the desired username already exists.

      • createPlay

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{userId}/plays")
 @Consumes(value={"application/json","application/xml"})
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createPlay(Play play,
                                                                                                                                           @PathParam(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.Long userId,
                                                                                                                                           @HeaderParam(value="Authorization")
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String authorizationBearer)
        It receives POST requests sent to "/users/{userId}/plays" path and creates a play for the user, with the desired attributes.
        Parameters:
        play - the Play object representation to create
        userId - the id of the user, taken from the url
        authorizationBearer - the authorization bearer to ensure user authentication
        Returns:
        201 Created containing the URI of the created play, if everything it's correct,
        401 Unauthorized if the user it's not authenticated.

      • findAllUsers

        @GET
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response findAllUsers(@QueryParam(value="filter")
                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> filter,
                                                   @QueryParam(value="order")
                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> order)
        It receives the GET requests sent to "/users" and returns all the users existing in the database, sorted and filtered with the desired criteria.
        Parameters:
        filter - is a list of couples "filterName@filterValue", where filterName can be only one of User.FilterBy and filterValue is the string representation of the desired value for the user attribute to filter
        order - is a list of couples "orderBy@orderMode", where orderBy can be only one of User.OrderBy and orderMode can be only one of MyEntityManager.OrderMode
        Returns:
        200 OK if there are no errors in the parameters,
        400 Bad request if the parameters are not correct.

      • getCount

        @GET
 @Path(value="/count")
 @Produces(value={"text/plain","text/xml","application/json","application/xml"})
public long getCount()
        It receives the GET requests sent to "/users" and returns the count of all the users existing in the database.
        Returns:
        count of users

 @Path(value="/{id}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response findById(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                     java.lang.Long id)
        Find by id.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getPlaysByUser

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{userId}/plays")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getPlaysByUser(@PathParam(value="userId")
                                                                                     java.lang.Long userId,
                                                                                     @QueryParam(value="filter")
                                                                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> filter,
                                                                                     @QueryParam(value="order")
                                                                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> order)
        It receives the GET requests sent to "/users/{userId}/plays" and returns all the plays created by the user with id={userId}m existing in the database, sorted and filtered with the desired criteria.
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user that creates the play
        filter - is a list of couples "filterName@filterValue", where filterName can be only one of Play.FilterBy and filterValue is the string representation of the desired value for the user attribute to filter
        order - is a list of couples "orderBy@orderMode", where orderBy can be only one of Play.OrderBy and orderMode can be only one of MyEntityManager.OrderMode
        Returns:
        200 OK if there are no errors in the parameters,
        400 Bad request if the parameters are not correct.

 @Path(value="/{userId}")
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response putUser(@FormParam(value="fullName")

        Put user.
        Parameters:
        fullName - the full name
        username - the username
